title: Versailles California King Bed
description:
Sleeping like royalty with this Versailles collection, the bedroom set was inspired by old European design. This collection features carved scrollwork accent on headboard. The accent pieces crafted in wood with antique platinum and also included regal features such as ample storage, beveled mirror, and antique platinum finish hardware. This bedroom set will give you a royal sensation in the bedroom.

title: Gorsedd Queen Bed
description:
The Gorsedd bed collection is exclusively designed and filled with romantic spirit. A piece crafted and inspired by the luxurious designs of the past, this gorgeous panel bed features a stunning arched headboard and low profile footboard in an antique champagne finish. Expertly detailed, this gorgeous bed features a button tufted headboard and footboard with elaborate carvings and raised-scrolled floral molding trim on its wood frame. Add glamorous French provincial charm with this uniquely designed collection that will make a statement in any bedroom.

title: Ragenardus Eastern King Bed
description:
The Ragenardus collection harmonizes traditional details with functional design to accommodate today's styles. This bedroom collection features vintage white veneers, curved panel HB, button tufted headboard/footboard, crown & raised scrolled work ornamental trim and hand-carved style wood drawer overlays throughout all case pieces. The ample storage case pieces, beveled mirror, top Felt-Lined drawers, and metal glide make this set truly elegant and will be a great addition to your home.
